Orbit Comprehensive Message (OCM)¶

class ccsds_ndm.Ocm(header, segment)¶

Represents a CCSDS Orbit Comprehensive Message (OCM).

static from_file(path, format)¶

Create an OCM message from a file.

Parameters:

  • path (str) – Path to the input file.

  • format (str, optional) – Format (‘kvn’ or ‘xml’). Auto-detected if None.

Returns:

The parsed OCM object.

Return type:

Ocm

static from_str(data, format)¶

Create an OCM message from a string.

Parameters:

  • data (str) – Input string/content.

  • format (str, optional) – Format (‘kvn’ or ‘xml’). Auto-detected if None.

Returns:

The parsed OCM object.

Return type:

Ocm

header¶
segment¶
to_file(path, format)¶

Write to file.

Parameters:

  • path (str) – Output file path.

  • format (str) – Output format (‘kvn’ or ‘xml’).

to_str(format)¶

Serialize to string.

Parameters:

format (str) – Output format (‘kvn’ or ‘xml’).

Returns:

The serialized string.

Return type:

str

class ccsds_ndm.OcmSegment(metadata, data)¶

Create a new OCM Segment.

Parameters:

  • metadata (OcmMetadata) – Segment metadata.

  • data (OcmData) – Segment data.

data¶
metadata¶
